data.title: CO13 9FF - 3 bedroom house in Frinton-On-Sea - Essex
data.meta_description: A three bedroom terraced house in the seaside town of Frinton on sea with its beach and greens ward.

Summary

Three bedroom terraced house in the seaside town of Frinton on sea

Description

A three bedroom terraced house in the seaside town of Frinton on sea with its beach and greens ward. The house is a short walk to the rail station to London, short walk to the high street with unique shops, pub, restaurants and award winning sandy beach.

House comprises of hall, kitchen, downstairs toilet, lounge/diner, garden, 3 bedrooms and bathroom.

ENTRANCE HALL

Laminate flooring

KITCHEN

fully fitted kitchen with integrated appliances , stainless steel sink, tiled floor

LOUNGE/DINER

Laminate flooring, tv/phone points, large storage cupboard, patio doors lead into garden

DOWNSTAIRS TOILET

Large bathroom with toilet and fitted sink unit

BATHROOM

Fully fitted bathroom with bath and shower, heated towel rail.

BEDROOM ONE

Large double bedroom, tv and telephone point. Window overlooking garden.

BEDROOM TWO

fully fitted floor to ceiling wardrobes.

BEDROOM THREE

Good size single bedroom or office.

OUTSIDE FRONT

Double front drive

OUTSIDE BACK.

Established garden with patio area, side entrance, shed.

Key Features

Key Features

• 3 bedrooms

• Fully fitted kitchen

• Allocated parking

• Private garden

• UPVC double glazing and Gase Central Heating

Particulars

Tenure: Leasehold

Lease Length: 117 years

Council Tax Band: D

Monthly Cost Calculator

The ‘estimated total monthly cost’ for a Shared Ownership property consists of three separate elements added together: rent, service charge and mortgage.

Read More Read Less

Rent: This is charged on the share you do not own and is usually payable to a housing association (rent is not generally payable on shared equity schemes).

Service Charge: Covers maintenance and repairs for communal areas within your development.

Mortgage: Share to Buy use a database of mortgage rates to work out the rate likely to be available for the deposit amount shown, and then generate an estimated monthly plan on a 25 year capital repayment basis.

NB: This mortgage estimate is not confirmation that you can obtain a mortgage and you will need to satisfy the requirements of the relevant mortgage lender. This is not a guarantee that in practice you would be able to apply for such a rate, nor is this a recommendation that the rate used would be the best product for you.

Shared Ownership Resale

Shared Ownership Resales: Also known as part buy part rent on second hand homes, with this affordable home ownership scheme you purchase a share of the property and rent the remainder from the housing provider.
